name: SourceSafe-Integration
description: This package is now deprecated.  Use Source Control  ( vimscript #770 ) instead.
install_details:
Use as Plugin or source from _vimrc.
Don't forget to add a '.project' file containing the sourcesafe project you are working with in the physical directory where your project is.

versions.release_notes:
- Use 'cat' if &shell contains 'sh'
- Explain $SSDIR & #include in doco.
Fixes for William D. Bartholomew
- Add ssDeployFile for the ability to deploy a file by default instead of a directory
- Fix space in historybuffer temp name.

- Fix up system call with $VIMRUNTIME containing spaces. -Zak Beck
 - Make Get prompt to overwrite a read-only file.
 - Remove calls to ShortName where possible. (VSS shortname is not
   always the same as M$oft shortname anyway!)
 - Prevent Diff against project - causes wacky behaviour.

Add interactive mode for answering multiple questions.
Fix up checking of modified status & automatic reloading of status's
